inclusions: All entry tickets mentioned in itinerary
trips.itinerary_text:
Dubai - 6 Days Trip

Name: Ashok 
Pax: 6 Adults + 3 Child (7, 3 year & 1 infant)
Date: 03 Feb 2026 - 08 Feb 2026

Day 1: Arrival at Sharjah Airport to Deira/ Bur Dubai Hotel + Half Day Dubai city tour + Dhow cruise marina with Dinner - Pvt.
Day 2: Miracle Garden + Burj Khalifa 124th & 125th floor non-prime Hr. + Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo - Pvt.
Day 3: Ski Dubai - Snow plus + Standard Desert safari with BBQ dinner - Pvt.
Day 4: Visit Global Village - Pvt.
Day 5: Visit Dubai Frame + Dolphinarium and Seal Show. Departure from Deira/ Bur Dubai Hotel to DXB Airport

inclusions: Entry tickets for mentioned attractions points
trips.itinerary_text:
Phuket - 5 Days Trip

Name: Parani 
Pax: 14 Adult + 1 kid
Date: 28 Sep 2025 - 02 Oct 2025

Day 1: Transfer from HKT APT – HKT HTL  - PVT Evening Siam Niramit show with dinner & transfer PVT.
Day 2: Phi Phi Island and Khai Island by Speedboat incl. island fee - SIC.
Day 3: Tiger Park incl. entry ticket. 10 platform Zipline, Aquaria Phuket, Old Phuket Town -  PVT.
Day 4: Afternoon Sunset Yacht Sailing -  SIC.
Day 5: Dolphin show with ticket & transfer - PVT. Transfer from HKT HTL – HKT APT - PVT

exclusions: Optional activities unless mentioned under inclusions
trips.itinerary_text:
Meghalaya Special 8 day Holiday

Name: Varsha 
Pax: 3 Adults
Date: 28 Sep 2025 - 02 Oct 2025

Day 1: Arrival at Guwahati & Transfer to hotel Overnight stay at Guwahati. Accomodation at Pemaling Lords Eco Inn
Day 2: Check-out after breakfast and visit Airforce Museum, Umaiam lake, Elephant Falls.Hotel check in and overnight stay at Cherrapunji. Accomodation at Escapade Inn.
Day 3: Check out after breakfast and visit Weisawdong waterfalls (If Oprational) Nohkalikai Falls, Mawsmai Cave,Arwah cave,Single decker and double Decker Bridge,Overnight stay at Shillong Check out after breakfast and visit Weisawdong waterfalls (If Oprational) Nohkalikai Falls, Mawsmai Cave,Arwah cave,Single decker and double Decker Bridge,Overnight stay at Shillong. Accomodation at Pine Hill Homestay.
Day 4: Hotel check-out,Bamboo Trekking or clean village drive to Dwaki.Night stay at Dawki Home stay or camp. Accomodation at Camp stay/home stay.
Day 5: Dawki Activities, Visit Karangsuri waterfalls,And Transfer to Shillong overnight stay at Cordzz Inn. Accomodation at Cordzz's Inn.
Day 6: Check out after breakfast and visit Phe phe falls and other local attractions and drive to Bharamaputra Jungle Resort. Accomodation at Bharamaputra Jungle resort.
Day 7: Wake up and Refresh and drive to Pobitora Wildlife Sanctuary, Jeep Safari at Pobitora Evening  Bhramaputhta Sunset Cruise and proceed to Guwahati. Accomodation at Pohor Regency.
Day 8: Early check out and visit Kamakhya Temple and Evening drop at Guwahati Airport

inclusions: Accommodation with breakfast as per above mentioned
3 way transfer Pvt to/from DMK APT
Coral island with lunch by speed boat SIC (Seat in Coach with other Tourist)
Pattaya tiger park with entry ticket + floating market incl. boat ride PVT (Private Transfers)
Safari World & Marine Park Entrance Tickets
Sanctuary of truth & art in paradise tickets - PVT (Private Transfers)
Bangkok Jurassic Park & Chocolate Villa entrance ticket
trips.itinerary_text:
Pattaya & Bangkok - 6D Trip

Name: Karthick 
Pax: 4 Adults + 1 kid
Date: 01 Oct 2025 - 06 Oct 2025

Day 1: Transfer from DMK APT – PTY HTL followed by breakfast at sri racha zoo no entry ticket + floating market including boat ride -  Pvt .Pattaya tiger park including entry ticket (Smallest size) &  Alcazar show with ticket & transfer Pvt.
Day 2: Coral island with lunch by speed boat - SIC Sanctury of truth & art in paradise with ticket & transfer - Pvt.
Day 3: Pattaya to Bangkok transfer enroute Safari World & Marine Park incl. lunch Private [Monday remain closed]
Day 4: Bangkok Ancient city tour with entrance ticket - Pvt.
Evening Chaopharaya princess dinner cruise - SIC.
Day 5: Bangkok Jurassic Park experience day ticket followed by Chocolate Villa including entrance ticket  .Evening Mahanokom Sky Bridge at Sunset -  Pvt.

inclusions: 04 nights stay at above mentioned the hotel with breakfast
Gardens by the Bay - Flower Dome + Cloud Forest
Marina Bay Sands Sky Park Observation Deck
All tours & transfer on private basis
trips.itinerary_text:
Singapore - 5 Days Trip

Name: Kumar 
Pax: 6 Adults
Date: 17 Oct 2025 - 21 Oct 2025

Day 1: Singapore Arrival. Hotel Check-in at 2pm.  Evening Gardens by the Bay.
Day 2: Singapore Panoromic Drive City Tour 3hrs, Afternoon break at Hotel, Evening Marina Bay Sand.
Day 3: Singapore zoo, Afternoon break at Hotel, Evening Wings of Time at Sentosa.
Day 4: Mandai Bird Park, Afternoon break at Hotel, Evening Shopping 3hrs - China Town & Little India.
Day 5: Check-out at Noon. Transfer to Changi Airport. Explore by own - Jewel Changi Mall & Vortex Waterfall, explore airport attractions. Late evening flight.
